basic_information.scholarship_name: Academic Excellence Award in Honor of Ted Honea-NOMINATION

description: This scholarship was established in 2011 in honor of Dr. Ted Honea. Award to either a Junior or Senior music student with the highest GPA in Music and who has completed the Music Theory and Music History curriculum. Student chosen is to excel in the SOM academically. Eligibility School of Music student Junior or Senior Completed Music Theory and Music History curriculum Requirements AWARDED BY COMMITTEE NOMINATION. Nominated student(s) will be invited to apply by the college's scholarship coordinator.

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
criteria.raw_text: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
